page.title: 11PROPOSED 'MUCHTY BY_PASS
page.content: An interview with Mr. E. Titterington, Liberal councillor for Auchtermuchty, revealed that the proposed plan is to develop a by_pass to the south of Auchtermuchty. The new section of road, to be started in 1987 or 1988, will follow a line southwestwards from the existing A 91 at the lay_by at Rossie, crossing fields belonging to Rossie Farm and pass between the cemetery and the factory (Russell PH Electrodes Ltd.) and then crossing what is locally called the 'Muchty Green. A report is currently being prepared by the Scottish Development Department. The present A 91 road through Auchtermuchty is very narrow and twisty in places, with the houses and vehicles in close proximity. Road traffic management bans or restricts the parking of vehicles along this stretch of road.
